item.title: 据说 IFood 盯上了 Ticket 和 Alelo，以拓展餐券业务
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西外卖服务公司 iFood 正在寻求收购一家员工福利企业，并已盯上了几家公司，其中包括法国 Edenred SE 在当地的子公司 Ticket。【原文：Brazilian delivery service iFood is seeking to acquire an employee-benefits business and has eyed several firms including Ticket, the local unit of France’s Edenred SE, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行监管机构放宽危机后对杠杆贷款的限制
item.description: 美国银行业监管机构正在放宽奥巴马时代限制杠杆借贷的规定，因为私人信贷行业发展迅速，银行家们抱怨监管过多让他们无所适从。【原文：US bank regulators are easing Obama-era rules that curbed leveraged lending amid rapid growth in the private credit industry and complaints by bankers that they’re being sidelined by too much regulation.】

item.title: Polymarket 正在为 5900 万美元的自我赌注苦苦挣扎
item.description: 交易者在Polymarket是否会在年底前推出美国平台上押注超过5900万美元。但是，这个旨在简单回答 "是 "或 "否 "的问题却暴露了一个更深层次的问题：为解决不确定性而建立的预测市场本身可能也在与不确定性作斗争。【原文：Traders bet more than $59 million on whether Polymarket would launch its US platform before the end of the year. But a question meant to produce a simple yes-or-no answer has exposed a deeper problem: prediction markets built to resolve uncertainty may struggle with it themselves.】

item.title: Z Capital 为争取债权人酝酿饼干赌场合并案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Z Capital Group 正在权衡一项计划，将其陷入困境的赌场运营商 Affinity Interactive 与包括饼干连锁店 Mrs.【原文：Private equity firm Z Capital Group is weighing a plan to combine its beleaguered casino operator Affinity Interactive with other portfolio companies, including cookie chain Mrs. Fields, in an effort to assuage some of Affinity’s lenders, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 蓝色王子》主创回答（并回避）了我们最关心的问题
item.description: Tonda Ros 表示，他仍在为这款广受好评的游戏进行一次重大更新【原文：Tonda Ros says he’s still working on one more big update for the critically acclaimed game】

item.title: 就业数据强劲，收益率跳升，卢布升幅创五月份以来最大
item.description: 由于出人意料的强劲就业数据引发了对加拿大央行将在明年加息的押注，加元涨幅创下 5 月份以来最大，国债收益率也随之飙升。【原文：The Canadian dollar rose the most since May and yields on the nation’s debt jumped as surprisingly strong employment data triggered bets that the Bank of Canada will raise interest rates next year.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行以 2,250 万欧元与法国洗钱案达成和解
item.description: 法国检察官称，桑坦德银行同意支付 2250 万欧元（2620 万美元），以了结 2013 年立案调查的巴黎分行洗钱指控。【原文：Banco Santander SA agreed to pay €22.5 million ($26.2 million) to settle a case opened in 2013 into operations at its Paris branches that included allegations of money laundering, French prosecutors said.】

item.title: 丹-桑德海姆（Dan Sundheim）的 GameStop 短痛让他对 2025 年的动荡有所准备
item.description: 2021 年，GameStop Corp. 的空头挤压使丹-桑德海姆（Dan Sundheim）的公司在一个月内损失了 40 亿美元，这让他震惊不已，因此，当 3 月份的市场动荡再次刺激对冲基金平仓时，他已经做好了准备。【原文：The GameStop Corp. short squeeze that cost Dan Sundheim’s firm $4 billion in a single month in 2021 left him in a state of shock, so he was prepared when market turmoil in March again spurred hedge funds to unwind bets.】

item.title: 沃伦要求在大规模破产后进行私人信用压力测试
item.description: 美国参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）正敦促监管机构仔细检查迅速发展的私人信贷市场，并警告说，就华尔街最大银行持有的坏账而言，三色控股公司（Tricolor Holdings）和第一品牌集团（First Brands Group）的破产 "很可能只是冰山一角"。【原文：US Senator Elizabeth Warren is urging regulators to scrutinize the burgeoning private credit market, warning that implosions of Tricolor Holdings and First Brands Group are “likely the tip of the iceberg” in terms of bad debt held by Wall Street’s biggest banks.】

item.title: 阿根廷创纪录的最大小麦产量引发物流狂潮
item.description: 阿根廷创纪录的小麦收成刺激了将收成运往谷物码头的物流热潮，并帮助将全球价格维持在多年低点附近。【原文：A record wheat crop in Argentina is spurring a logistics frenzy to get harvests to grain terminals and helping to keep global prices at around multi-year lows.】

item.title: 瑞银称锂电复苏是买入时机，Albemarle 跳涨
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）分析师表示，随着电池金属价格的上涨将推动盈利增加，现在是买入该股的时机。【原文：Top lithium producer Albemarle Corp. rose the most among peers after UBS analysts said now is the time to buy the stock with rising prices of the battery metal set to drive up earnings.】

item.title: 神秘交易员在华纳兄弟期权赌注中一夜之间牟利 120 万美元
item.description: 在 Netflix 公司从娱乐公司竞购战中胜出后，一名交易员通过押注华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：A trader made more than a million dollars in profit betting on a rise in Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. shares, cashing in the position after Netflix Inc. emerged as the winner from a bidding war for the entertainment company.】

item.title: 重要油价机构普氏能源资讯将忽略来自俄罗斯的原油燃料
item.description: 世界上确定实物商品基准价格的主要公司之一表示，在进行评估时，它将开始忽略由俄罗斯原油制成的燃料。【原文：One of the world’s main companies for setting benchmark prices of physical commodities said it will start to ignore fuel that’s made from Russian crude when making its assessments.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利提高医疗保健公司债券发行收益率
item.description: 以摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）为首的银行集团提高了 Sevita Whole Health LLC 债券发行的收益率，此前他们一直在努力出售这家医疗服务公司的债务。【原文：A group of banks led by Morgan Stanley has raised the yield on a bond offering for Sevita Whole Health LLC after struggling to sell the healthcare services firm’s debt.】

item.title: 密歇根州立大学获得创纪录的 4.01 亿美元认捐以促进体育发展
item.description: 密歇根州立大学从一位保险企业家及其妻子那里获得了 4.01 亿美元的投资，这是该校历史上最大的一笔投资。【原文：Michigan State University is getting a $401 million commitment, the largest in its history, from an insurance entrepreneur and his wife, mostly to bolster athletics at a time when big-time sports programs are vying to pay top players.】

item.title: 比利时政府批准出售贝尔菲乌斯 20% 的股份
item.description: 比利时政府已同意出售国有银行 Belfius 20% 的股份，并希望在国家债务持续增长的情况下增加国防开支。【原文：The Belgian government has given the nod to the sale of a 20% stake in state-owned bank Belfius, eying a ramp-up in defense spending as the nation’s debt continues to grow.】

item.title: 意大利最高法院支持 ION 公司就黄金电力裁决提起上诉
item.description: 意大利最高法院撤销了对 ION 集团金融服务部门 Cedacri SpA 施加一系列限制的金权裁决。【原文：Italy’s top court annulled a golden power ruling that imposed a series of restrictions on Cedacri SpA, the financial services unit of ION Group.】

item.title: 瑞银股价因瑞士可能减轻部分资本打击的报告而上涨
item.description: 路透社报道称，瑞士政府正在考虑放宽银行监管方案的部分内容，这将使瑞银集团的资本要求增加数十亿美元，随后瑞银集团股价上涨。【原文：UBS Group AG shares rose after Reuters reported that the Swiss government was considering easing part of a bank regulation package that would add billions to the lender’s capital requirements.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 Parloa 据称将在新一轮融资中寻求 2 亿美元投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，为客户服务开发人工智能的德国初创公司 Parloa 正在寻求新的融资，其估值将比 5 月份大幅提高。【原文：Parloa, a German startup developing artificial intelligence for customer service, is looking to raise new funding that would significantly increase its valuation from May, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谢因称法国停职案是政治过激行为
item.description: 在线快时尚零售商Shein表示，法国政府利用销售儿童性玩偶和武器引发的政治风波，试图暂停该平台的业务，是过分的做法。【原文：Shein, the online fast-fashion retailer, said the French government was overreaching in its attempt to suspend the platform by capitalizing on a political furor over sales of a childlike sex doll and weapons.】

item.title: 就业市场出人意料，市场押注加拿大央行在 2026 年底前加息
item.description: 市场越来越多地预期加拿大央行的下一步行动将是明年加息，因为该国劳动力市场出人意料的强劲表明，尽管美国征收关税，但可能并不需要进一步放松货币政策。【原文：Markets increasingly expect the Bank of Canada’s next move will be a rate hike next year, as the country’s unexpected labor market strength suggests further monetary easing may not be needed despite US tariffs.】

item.title: 报道称博尔索纳罗将支持儿子参选，巴西股市下跌
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，巴西前总统博尔索纳罗打算支持他的儿子弗拉维奥-博尔索纳罗（Flavio Bolsonaro）参加明年 10 月的总统选举，巴西资产周五迅速跌至盘中低点。【原文：Brazilian assets quickly slumped to session lows on Friday after a local media report that former President Jair Bolsonaro intends to back his son Flavio Bolsonaro in presidential elections next October.】

item.title: 被无人机击中的 "凯罗斯 "号油轮现距离保加利亚海岸一英里处
item.description: 巴尔干国家的海事当局说，上周在土耳其附近遭到乌克兰无人机袭击的一艘油轮现在距离保加利亚海岸约一英里。【原文：An oil tanker that was struck by Ukrainian drones near Turkey last week is now about a mile off the coast of Bulgaria, the Balkan nation’s maritime authority said.】

item.title: 小额贷款策略师预计 2026 年发行量将突破 6000 亿美元
item.description: 市政债券市场的策略师们大多预测，2026 年地方政府将至少出售 6000 亿美元的债务，超过今年已创纪录的发行量，因为发行者们希望退还未偿还债务并填补联邦资金削减带来的漏洞。【原文：Strategists in the municipal bond market are mostly predicting local governments will sell as least $600 billion of debt in 2026, eclipsing the record amount already offered this year as issuers look to refund outstanding debt and plug holes from federal funding cuts.】

item.title: 市场并不担心美联储的独立性
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Invesco 未获得将 QQQ 转为 ETF 所需的票数
item.description: Invesco Ltd.表示，该公司将推迟将热门科技基金 QQQ 转换为开放式 ETF 的代理投票，以便有更多时间获得所需的 51% 的股东批准。【原文：Invesco Ltd. said that it’s adjourning its proxy vote to convert popular tech fund QQQ into an open-ended ETF to allow more time to garner the needed 51% approval from shareholders.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 的鲁布纳看好年底和 2026 年初的行情
item.description: Citadel Securities 公司股票和股票衍生品策略主管斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）认为，随着投资者定位发出看涨信号，季节性因素又提供了额外的 "顺风"，美股将在年底和 2026 年初继续上涨。【原文：US stocks are set to continue their run into year-end and early 2026, with investor positioning flashing bullish signals and seasonality providing an additional tailwind, according to Scott Rubner, head of equity and equity derivatives strategy at Citadel Securities.】

item.title: 德国天然气溢价飙升预示储气忧虑持续存在
item.description: 德国天然气期货交易较欧洲基准的溢价跃升至三年来的新高，表明对其燃料库存过低的担忧依然存在。【原文：The premium that German natural gas futures trade above Europe’s benchmark jumped to a three-year high, signaling that concerns about its low fuel inventories remain.】

item.title: 乌克兰MHP计划发行入侵以来的首支公司债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，农业公司 MHP SE 正在评估投资者对乌克兰企业部门自俄罗斯全面入侵以来首次发行债券的兴趣。【原文：Agricultural firm MHP SE is gauging investor interest in what would be the Ukrainian corporate sector’s first bond since Russia’s full scale-invasion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: KKR 将投资布鲁克菲尔德的 Compass 数据中心资产
item.description: KKR & Co.同意投资由布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）支持的数字基础设施运营商 Compass Datacenters 的投资组合，私募股权巨头们竞相在人工智能热潮中分得一杯羹。【原文：KKR & Co. agreed to invest in the portfolio of Compass Datacenters, the digital infrastructure operator backed by Brookfield Asset Management Ltd., as private equity giants race to grab a bigger piece of the AI boom.】
